911065383041245200,Fri Sep 22 03:11:28 +0000 2017,RT @timesofindia: Rohingya are not refugees but illegal migrants, says @rajnathsingh https://t.co/tpdb12RO02 https://t.co/Dd1y3R2py2
910759142071177200,Thu Sep 21 06:54:35 +0000 2017,In spite of all this India govt has provided humanitarian aid to Rohingyas in Bangladesh.
910758985116143600,Thu Sep 21 06:53:57 +0000 2017,Illegal immigration pose threat to our national security. We should understand this.
910758405614264300,Thu Sep 21 06:51:39 +0000 2017,No Rohingya has been given asylum in India neither did they ever applied for that.
910757923210645500,Thu Sep 21 06:49:44 +0000 2017,Ppl talk abt Non-refoulement to challenge our decision of deporting Rohingya. But let me tell thm it applies to people who have taken asylum
910757275178078200,Thu Sep 21 06:47:10 +0000 2017,By deporting them we are not violating any international law as we are not a signatory to 1951 Refugee Convention.
910757050195509200,Thu Sep 21 06:46:16 +0000 2017,To obtain refugee status there is a process. Rohingyas have not followed any process to obtain this status.
910756884692525000,Thu Sep 21 06:45:37 +0000 2017,Few people talk about HR of illegal immigrants. On this I want to says that Rohingya are not refugees.
910756630920417300,Thu Sep 21 06:44:36 +0000 2017,Before thinking about HR of others we have to safeguards the rights of our own citizens.
910756518177501200,Thu Sep 21 06:44:09 +0000 2017,Sometimes in name of HR such things are promoted that pose grave thereat to our shared idea of India.
910756358106091500,Thu Sep 21 06:43:31 +0000 2017,It is our firm resolve that by May 2018 all villages across India will have electricity. By 2022 we want to ensure housing for all families.
910755947743776800,Thu Sep 21 06:41:53 +0000 2017,In 2104, 18000 villages had no electricity. But in three years since then now 15000 villages have electricity.
910753860737740800,Thu Sep 21 06:33:36 +0000 2017,PM Ujjwala Yojna was meant to ensure dignified life to crores of women. We believe development without dignity is of no use.
910752906554507300,Thu Sep 21 06:29:48 +0000 2017,Our aim is dignity with development.
910752751986102300,Thu Sep 21 06:29:11 +0000 2017,In our policies ensuring good gov and development we have given utmost imp to the dignity of our people.
910752530753302500,Thu Sep 21 06:28:18 +0000 2017,We are deeply committed towards development of one & all. And we will ensure this through public participation at all levels.
910752258941489200,Thu Sep 21 06:27:14 +0000 2017,Good governance will help in ensuring that govt benefits reaches to people who had been left out till now.
910751339776499700,Thu Sep 21 06:23:35 +0000 2017,Good governance will help in unlocking the great growth potential that India has.
910751228124115000,Thu Sep 21 06:23:08 +0000 2017,I believe India will emerge as best model of 'digital democracy' in 21st century.
910750953443397600,Thu Sep 21 06:22:02 +0000 2017,JAM (Jan Dhan-Aadhaar-Mobile) trinity will have a huge and positive impact on our economy & time will prove this.
910750863731363800,Thu Sep 21 06:21:41 +0000 2017,Financial inclusion was an imperative for good admin and we ensured that though PMJDY.
910750698068955100,Thu Sep 21 06:21:02 +0000 2017,We did away with many obsolete law and implemented GST. This was all done for effective and clean admin.
910750567731011600,Thu Sep 21 06:20:30 +0000 2017,To eradicate corruption in appointment of govt jobs we did away with interview in class C & D central services.
910750435207770100,Thu Sep 21 06:19:59 +0000 2017,Demonetization was done to ensure that black and illegal money is weeded out of system.
910750303720542200,Thu Sep 21 06:19:27 +0000 2017,The first decision we took after forming govt was to form SIT on black money.
910749981769859100,Thu Sep 21 06:18:11 +0000 2017,We made the policy which is extremely transparent. Creating a strong anti-corruption system is main task of good governance.
910749656442863600,Thu Sep 21 06:16:53 +0000 2017,Example: In coal blocks allocations the system which was created, it could not ensure transparency.
910749528961306600,Thu Sep 21 06:16:23 +0000 2017,Good gov is about creating systems and processes that helps in taking the right decisions.
910748224146767900,Thu Sep 21 06:11:12 +0000 2017,We have not only adhered to all the principles of good gov but also is deeply committed towards it.
910747875516276700,Thu Sep 21 06:09:49 +0000 2017,5 Key attributes of good gov is Transparency, Responsibility, Accountability Participation, Responsiveness (to the needs of the people).
910747501883469800,Thu Sep 21 06:08:19 +0000 2017,Because of which good gov, HR and development in independent India faced problems.
910746986755891200,Thu Sep 21 06:06:17 +0000 2017,Sadly after independence the importance that should have been given to maintain this sacredness was not given.
910746772166840300,Thu Sep 21 06:05:25 +0000 2017,In modern, India it is the constitution from where good governance, Human Rights and development emanates. They form a sacred trinity.
910744854048772100,Thu Sep 21 05:57:48 +0000 2017,We have long tradition of good governance. You will find its reference in Mahabharata which talks in great details about duties of a king.
910744695399206900,Thu Sep 21 05:57:10 +0000 2017,In India, we have always given importance to peace and social welfare,  not struggle.
910743436789272600,Thu Sep 21 05:52:10 +0000 2017,This thinking is the result our rich culture and tradition.
910743246854398000,Thu Sep 21 05:51:25 +0000 2017,...there cannot be fundamental rights but only fundamental duties. Rights will automatically be ensured.

text: Mahatma Gandhi said
column4: "My illiterate but wise mother has told me that if you want to unsure everyone's rights then...

text: While many great personalities across the world gave their view points
column4: I want to tell what Mahatma Gandhi had said.

text: In post world war period
column4: it was debated what should be edifice of Human Rights.

text: It is thought that if everyone performs their duty well
column4: their rights will be naturally safeguarded.

text: In India tradition rights have never been seen in isolation rather it emanates from a sense of duties.
Relationships in India has always been based on sense of duty and not expectation. And this has strengthen the fabric of affection.
Maximum struggles that took place in Indian history was not for rights rather was for duties.
Where as in India Human Rights emanates from a sense of duty which is also seen as highest ideal or 'Dharma'.
Today's HR is based on Magna Carta
column4: American Revolution & French Revolution but we must remember that was result of long & violent struggle.

text: In west reference point for HR is Universal Declaration Of Human Rights (1948).
The biggest reason behind this is difference in thinking & approaches prevalent in 'west' and 'east' regarding human rights.
There is a general consensus on issue of development & good governance but on issue of human rights sometimes people have different opinions
There is a symbiotic & strong relation between good governance
column4: development and human rights. Common man is at the center of all this.

text: NHRC has organised this seminar which is not only related to the building a 'Progressive India' but also human rights all over the world.

text: I have said this categorically that all the stakeholders; who so ever wants to talk
column4: we will talk.

text: We are open to talks
column4: but people have to come forward to express their views. We never denied dialogues.

text: I feel as no issues are remaining now
column4: issues are being made from non-issues. It is very unfortunate.

text: Regarding Art 35 A I want to say that unnecessary doubts are being created. Our govt act in accordance to the sentiments of the people.
We want to make sure that along with peace
column4: people of Jammu and Kashmir are able to live with honor & dignity.

text: I will tell you it is based on 5 Cs i.e. 'Compassion
column4: Communication
column6: Confidence Building and Consistency.

text: We are concerned about your future. When we talked about permanent solution there were speculations as to what is it about.
I appeal to the  youth that no matter what the motivations are stay way from stone pelting.
I want to say that on behalf of central govt we will run a special drive to promote tourism here.
I want to tell the world today that people of Kashmir are welcoming you. You should visit this place.
A message was conveyed in the world that situation in Kashmir is not good which badly affected the tourism in state.
Perpetrators of violence have destroyed generations in Kashmir
column4: but we will not allow them to do this any more.

text: We believe that people of Jammu and Kashmir want to shape their destiny only through their hard work.
We have seen this and that is why we talked about permanent solution to the problem of Jammu and Kashmir.
Whatever I have seen seen in Kashmir I can say 'अमन के दरख्त  कश्मीर में अभी सूखे नहीं हैं'
They should be treated in manner as mentioned in juvenile justice act. They should be given proper counseling.
I also conducted security review meeting
column4: during which I said tht minors who got on wrong path by mistake should be not treated as criminals

text: There are some big projects regarding which I have said that no matter if its cost has increased
column4: DPR should be prepared & work should start

text: The package is being implemented but in review meeting I have asked for its even more effective and faster implementation.
The Rs 80000 crore PM package has now been increased to more than Rs 1 lakh crore.
After coming here I have reviewed PM package. Cost of some projects have escalated.
We want to see happiness and smile on face of every youth of Kashmir and not that pain. https://t.co/QoQW9J5zkq
I cannot forget the face of the daughter of martyred Jammu and Kashmir Police officer Abdul Rashid. https://t.co/QoQW9J5zkq
I have met J&K police
column4: also met Jawans of CAPF. I will be meeting our army men.  I want to make sure that no one is left in this dialogue.

text: I am not claiming that situation here has become perfect but it is indeed improving. And this I can say this with surety.
After meeting people from civil society
column4: non pol orgizations and political parties
column5: I have concluded that situation in Kashmir has improved.

text: We will meet people from all walks of life without any reservations. https://t.co/QoQW9J5zkq
In last 2 days 55 delegations had met us. I have come up with open mind and will like to meet all stake holders https://t.co/QoQW9J5zkq
PM has said
column4: Kashmir problem will neither be solved by bullets nor abuses but only by embracing ppl. I intend to make his belief a reality.

text: This is my firm conviction & coming here again and again clearly means that we want to resolve the problems of J&K https://t.co/QoQW9J5zkq

585 big mandis across the country will be connected through internet and that will help farmers getting best price for their produce.
